summary: The National STEM Week Act aims to promote STEM education and careers in the United States. It establishes a National STEM Week, led by the National Science and Technology Council Committee on Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics Education (CoSTEM), to highlight STEM's importance, showcase career pathways, encourage family engagement, and facilitate partnerships between educational institutions and industry. The act also requires CoSTEM to report annually on the activities and impact of National STEM Week.
